Package gov.sandia.geotess.extensions.rstt

Class LineScanner

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.geotess.extensions.rstt.LineScanner
public class LineScanner extends Object
A simple, yet fast, ascii file scanner that handles empty lines and lines with comments and lines with trailing comments.

    • hasNext

      public boolean hasNext() throws IOException
      Returns true if this LineScanner has more data.
      Returns:
      True if this LineScanner has more data.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • nextDouble

      public double nextDouble() throws IOException
      Returns the next token in lineScanner as a double. This method checks the current lineScanner instance for more input and creates a new instance with the next set of input if the current scanner is empty.
      Returns:
      The next scanner token as a double.
      Throws:
      IOException

      Returns:
      The next scanner token as a float.
      Throws:
      IOException
